feedback: Blood sugar was too low when I opened my eyes
Felt shaky and heavy — couldn’t sit up right away
Had to check my levels before I even left the bed
Had to count carbs and take insulin before eating
Waited to eat while others were already halfway through
Blood sugar started dropping in the middle of the store
Felt weak and a little dizzy near the frozen aisle
Grabbed juice and leaned on the cart for support
Kept acting normal so no one would notice
Glucose was too high — couldn’t think clearly
Missed half of what the teacher was saying
Didn’t speak up — didn’t trust my brain to respond
Had to sit on the bathroom floor and eat something
